statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_records WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE address = 'New York'
SELECT * from patient_records LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT m.record_id, m.patient_id, p.patient_name, m.doctor_name FROM MedicalRecords m JOIN Patients p ON m.patient_id = p.patient_id ORDER BY m.date_of_visit DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob, address FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';

SELECT Patients.first_name, Patients.last_name, MedicalRecords.date_of_visit, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT Doctors.first_name, Doctors.last_name, COUNT(MedicalRecords.record_id) AS total_records FROM Doctors LEFT JOIN MedicalRecords ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.doctor_id GROUP BY Doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT Patients.first_name, Patients.last_name, Doctors.first_name, Doctors.last_name FROM Patients CROSS JOIN Doctors WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female' AND Doctors.specialization = 'Pediatrics';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis, date_created FROM MedicalHistory ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT test_name, result FROM TestResults WHERE date_of_test = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalHistory JOIN Patients ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT test_name, result FROM TestResults WHERE date_of_test BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors;
SELECT med_name, med_description FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis = 'Cold';

SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, COUNT(Appointments.app_id) AS total_appointments FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_id ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;
SELECT patient_name, med_name, med_description FROM Patients JOIN Medications ON Patients.patient_id = Medications.med_id;
